value.name: Police ID man who was shot to death inside Port Richmond home
value.description: Luis Ramirez, 24, was found inside his apartment at 10 Palmer Ave. with a gunshot wound to the chest by cops who were responding to a report of an assault, police said in a statement. The ...

value.name: Shocking Child Pornography Arrests Of Eight Men In Santa Ana: Cop Investigation Took Months
value.description: Eight Santa Ana men suspected of possessing and distributing child pornography Saturday were awaiting their first court appearances after being arrested following a lengthy investigation, according to Santa Ana police.

value.name: Staten Island man shot to death in his home; police hunt killer
value.description: Police said they found Luis Ramirez shot in the chest in his attic apartment in a home on Palmer Ave. near Cortlandt St. in Elm Park about 3:55 p.m. Witnesses identified a 27-year-old shooting ...

value.name: Police: Woodway man arrested after threatening girlfriend with AK-47
value.description: Woodway officers arrested Jorge Luis Ramirez, 38, after responding to reports of a man threatening his family with a rifle at about 10 a.m. at an apartment in the 1500 block of Western Oaks Drive.

value.name: Eight Men Arrested For Allegedly Possessing, Distributing Child Pornography
value.description: Eight Santa Ana men suspected of possessing and distributing child pornography were arrested following a monthslong investigation, police said Friday. The Santa Ana Police Department began the investigation after receiving multiple tips,

value.name: ROAR: Contemporary Christian Romantic Suspense
value.description: Check out this great listen on Audible.com. Dancer Becca Stapleton lives to magnify the Lord through dance, but when she becomes involved in a gangland murder, her life becomes anything but the dance she imagined.
